duties_responsibilities.duty: Scheduling and registering patients for outpatient visits and procedures
Obtaining and verifying patient information for appointments and referrals
Assuring follow-up appointments and testing are coordinated with the patient
Collecting time of service payments and copayments
Reconciling cash drawer and reporting any discrepancies
Receiving and responding to patient and staff needs and complaints
Participating in on-going education activities to enhance professional expertise

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent (Medical terminology class preferred)
